name: DataBarExpandedEncoder
summary: Encodes GS1 DataBar Expanded symbols (linear and stacked).

methods.name: EncodeExpanded
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1 DataBar Expanded symbol into a CodeGlyphX.Barcode1D.

methods.name: EncodeExpandedStacked
methods.summary: Encodes a GS1 DataBar Expanded Stacked symbol into a CodeGlyphX.BitMatrix.
